markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9+"
    pfs=""
>
[Djezet Shield](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1413)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 98</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** varies by shield

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

**Base Material** [Djezet](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1410)

</column>

---

The burnished red faces of djezet-alloy shields attract effects made of pure magic. While you have a djezet shield [Raised](/Actions.aspx?ID=98), you can use the [Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=839) reaction when you would take energy damage in addition to the reaction's usual trigger. When taking energy damage from a spell, the shield's listed Hardness doubles.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 9"
pfs="Standard"
>
Djezet Buckler (Standard-Grade)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 98</row>

**Price** 600 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The shield has Hardness 3, HP 12, and BT 6.

**Craft Requirements** djezet worth at least 75 gp

level="2"

---

level="2"

>
